channel.title: Rusty Katana
channel.description:
Rusty as in I haven't even touched Meta in months... Anyways, I just decided to make a simple, primitive model - a katana. Its ubermensch simple, and I do plan on elaborating it at some point. Anyways, here: [img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/6701/katanav11.png[/img] [img]http://img81.imageshack.us/img81/2253/katanav12.png[/img] [img]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/2552/katanav13.png[/img]
CC it up.

item.title: Rusty Katana
item.dc:creator: @Pigrear Pigrear
item.description:
@Pigrear wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:9, topic:316096”]what the… O-o… swastika… swastika handle is 2d… no rust… more like “swastika Katana”
O-o…please fix the 2d swastika[/quote]

If it was a swastika the lines would be the same length. Haha. But it does kind of look like one.

@topic I think the handle should be a bit shorter and the blade a bit longer, but otherwise, looking good.

Read full topic

its not a swastica. it has a resemblance to one and no more.

item.title: Rusty Katana
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Yea, I’m taking a momentary break from learning blender. I’m beginning to model in blender now, I just need to learn more about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rusty Katana
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:6, topic:316096”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=412673.msg3040987#msg3040987 date=1259110057]

its not amazing but its not ‘shit’ if you get what im sayin. the hilt needs work. shape the blade more like a katana and make a new handle.

Hmm, well im not sure, but i believe he used my tut on this one, go easy on some people for a little while, since im a noob at it as well, trying to teach some of the basics

@TOPIC - Hmm, well, i’m curious, why is it named rusty? There is not much of a “rust” look too it at all. Also, Whats with the swastika? Overall though, for your, i believe, first primitive, ill give it a 7-10.
[/quote]
i am going easy on him… my comments are very rarely intended to be mean or harsh. im trying to better the persons skills by being upfront. if i sugar coat it can lead to a misunderstanding on what i meant. i forgot to add for being new to prims its decent. you should try a more ‘professional’ program imo. once i moved away from metasequoia i began progressing much faster[/quote]

Hmm, id like to talk more about that, mind adding me?

*removed

Read full topic

item.title: Rusty Katana
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:316096”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=412673.msg3040984#msg3040984 date=1259109857]
its not amazing but its not ‘shit’ if you get what im sayin. the hilt needs work. shape the blade more like a katana and make a new handle.
[/quote]

Hmm, well im not sure, but i believe he used my tut on this one, go easy on some people for a little while, since im a noob at it as well, trying to teach some of the basics

@TOPIC - Hmm, well, i’m curious, why is it named rusty? There is not much of a “rust” look too it at all. Also, Whats with the swastika? Overall though, for your, i believe, first primitive, ill give it a 7-10.[/quote]
i am going easy on him… my comments are very rarely intended to be mean or harsh. im trying to better the persons skills by being upfront. if i sugar coat it can lead to a misunderstanding on what i meant. i forgot to add for being new to prims its decent. you should try a more ‘professional’ program imo. once i moved away from metasequoia i began progressing much faster

Read full topic

item.title: Rusty Katana
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright didn’t remember seeing a model from you in quite a while, and i didn’t remember if any of them were primitives or not. To be honest, that tutorial i wrote, is the last time i have touched meta since the last model i posted here, which has been a long time.

Well, sorry for going off topic, but nice to see you modeling again.

Read full topic

item.title: Rusty Katana
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Yeah I get exactly what you’re saying. The hilt I knew needed work, the blade, well, I’m never that good at making primitive blades, and considering I was making a blade for a sword, I used a cylinder, so it almost half worked I think. The handle, well yea. I only made it decent enough to make it work. So I’ll work on it :d

@Coon:
o shit, was thinking of bleach so I came up with that for a hilt, never thought of it as a swastika XD. and it’s just a katana, I only put rusty in the title because this is the first thing I’ve modeled in almost 3 months, so I’m a bit rusty with meta. And I actually think this is my 2nd - 4th prim. I know it’s not the 1st though.

Read full topic

item.title: Rusty Katana
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

dylan_0789:

its not amazing but its not ‘shit’ if you get what im sayin. the hilt needs work. shape the blade more like a katana and make a new handle.

Hmm, well im not sure, but i believe he used my tut on this one, go easy on some people for a little while, since im a noob at it as well, trying to teach some of the basics

@TOPIC - Hmm, well, i’m curious, why is it named rusty? There is not much of a “rust” look too it at all. Also, Whats with the swastika? Overall though, for your, i believe, first primitive, ill give it a 7-10.

Read full topic
